disclaimerText1: MindCapital sold the promise of easy profits, but it ended up being a Ponzi scheme that left thousands of people without their money. Many trusted the system and could never recover what they invested.
disclaimerText2: $MCapital is not just a memecoin, it’s a financial comeback. A portion of the profits will fund the lawsuit against MindCapital, while the rest will boost the project’s visibility.
quote: NO BAD COINS, JUST CRIMINAL CREATORS.
